column4: Frogzoo > why does my ubuntu doesn't play VCD? i've done all the instructions from wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFromats.
sudo apt-get install linux-headers-$(uname -r)   should work ..
the same result... E: couldn't find package linux-headers-2.6.15-27-386
it's in main so it should install on dapper
your apt sources list might be borked then
let me check.. .thanks for the help
I have it installed here ( jsut checked) so it's available for sure :)
possibly you don't have the security repos enabled
it's working now. need to modify my sources.list
thanks so much for the help
